channel.title: Knights of the Stone - Pagan Heralds!!!
channel.description:
Pagan music and pagan talk, covering American Pagan communities. Dreams, Hopes and Fears of the modern pagan from 'meso-traditionalists' to neo-pagan fellowships in the USA. If you want to contribute to our show by doing an interview, listing a commercial, or sening us your pagan music to share and promote, you can! Send it to: knights@podomatic.com or thedruids003@yahoo.com Leave us your comments, questions, or complaints! We care about our audince! Add Us!
VitalPodcasts.com Subscribe Rmail
channel.itunes:subtitle: Harken to the music!
channel.itunes:author: Aiyanna DeBeansidhe & Shadar Stridanth

item.title: Episode 24 Spring 2011
item.description: Welcome back!!! Finally we are back, and this time we have a layout that will let us continue to grow on air, on line and in life!
item.dc:creator: Aiyanna DeBeansidhe & Shadar Stridanth
item.itunes:summary: Welcome back!!! Finally we are back, and this time we have a layout that will let us continue to grow on air, on line and in life!

item.title: Episode 23 December 2010
item.description: This is our years end show, but never fear, we will continue bringing our podcast to you!
item.dc:creator: Aiyanna DeBeansidhe & Shadar Stridanth
item.itunes:summary: This is our years end show, but never fear, we will continue bringing our podcast to you!

item.title: Episode 22 New Podcast 1
item.description: After a long time away, we are returning to our web presence and renewing our podcast format somewhat. Still providing the music you have come to expect, and a few things that will be new. Hello to all our new friends in and around Idaho Falls, Idaho.
item.dc:creator: Aiyanna DeBeansidhe & Shadar Stridanth
item.itunes:summary: After a long time away, we are returning to our web presence and renewing our podcast format somewhat. Still providing the music you have come to expect, and a few things that will be new. Hello to all our new friends in and around Idaho Falls, Idaho.

item.title: Knights August 2008 PodCast!
item.description: Oh what a wonderful month last month was, and a great Lammas season as well. A shout out to many good people, and some more information regarding our plans for the Witches Ball for Idaho Falls. Keep sending in your info, comments and music... Well met, and Blessed Be!
item.dc:creator: Aiyanna DeBeansidhe & Shadar Stridanth
item.itunes:summary: Oh what a wonderful month last month was, and a great Lammas season as well. A shout out to many good people, and some more information regarding our plans for the Witches Ball for Idaho Falls. Keep sending in your info, comments and music... Well met, and Blessed Be!

item.title: Knights July 2008 PodCast!
item.description: Yes! It has been some time, but here we are again folks, with music to sooth and a few announcements. Lammas in Pocatello, ID on August 1 at 7pm ( Details can be attained by contacting us at thedruids003@yahoo.com )and we are planning our Witches Ball to be held either in Idaho Falls or in Pokie! Details on that and inquiries welcome will be coming throughout the summer podcasts. All our podcasts are presented to you as is, nothing fancy, just good fun! Check out the website for further info on the Idaho Pagan events. http://freewebs.com/knights-of-the-stone Keep tuned in, and as always, we welcome your input
item.dc:creator: Aiyanna DeBeansidhe & Shadar Stridanth
item.itunes:summary:
Yes! It has been some time, but here we are again folks, with music to sooth and a few announcements. Details on that and inquiries welcome will be coming throughout the summer podcasts. All our podcasts are presented to you as is, nothing fancy, just good fun! Check out the website for further info on the Idaho Pagan events. http://freewebs.com/knights-of-the-stone
Keep tuned in, and as always, we welcome your input

item.title: January 2008 - A new year Dawns
item.description: And a great new year to you all! Been a buisy month for us so far, and we have many new things comeing. Stay tuned, and thanks for all the support last year! keep the coments comeing and help us share with others. Been really active here and the bandwidth is just barely keeping up! We love it, and you for tuneing in!
item.dc:creator: Aiyanna DeBeansidhe & Shadar Stridanth
item.itunes:summary: And a great new year to you all! Been a buisy month for us so far, and we have many new things comeing. Stay tuned, and thanks for all the support last year! keep the coments comeing and help us share with others. Been really active here and the bandwidth is just barely keeping up! We love it, and you for tuneing in!

item.title: Knights August PodCast!
item.description: Hey Foks, and welome back! We'v been buisy these last few weeks dealing with the mundane and growing within our home community, but we haven't forgotten you! Join us with this short casting and enjoy life! As always, give us your comments and feeback, join in on our podcast and share yursefl with the world: contact us at, thedruids003@yaoo.com, or call ino our podcast phone line and be a part of our podcast
item.dc:creator: Aiyanna DeBeansidhe & Shadar Stridanth
item.itunes:summary:
Hey Foks, and welome back! We'v been buisy these last few weeks dealing with the mundane and growing within our home community, but we haven't forgotten you! Join us with this short casting and enjoy life!
As always, give us your comments and feeback, join in on our podcast and share yursefl with the world: contact us at, thedruids003@yaoo.com, or call ino our podcast phone line and be a part of our podcast

item.title: Knights PodCast! - On Pagan Clergy
item.description: On this show we present more music from our buddy Sede and add to our show Shadar's Muses on Pagan Clergy. We are looking into the needs of further education of pagan clergy, the examples that we as clergy and elders give to our community, and the things we need to develope and continue to learn as community leaders. More information can be found at: http://www.freewebs.com/knights-of-the-stone Check us out! Comments always welcome here
